Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate jekara asim inham upara rahima kari'e ate inham upara jihare kasata hana usa nu dura kara de'i'e tam vi uha virodha vica kurahe pa'e rahinage
Ate asim inham nu saza vica pharhi'a. Paratu na iha apane raba de age jhuke ate na inham ne nimarata dikha'i
Ithom taka ki jadom asim inham upara kathaura saza de daravaze khol'ha devange tam uha usa samem hairana rahi janage
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne tuhade la'i kana, akham ate dila bana'i'a. Tusim bahuta ghata sukara karade ho
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne tuhanu dharati vica phaila'i'a ate tusi' use vala ikathe kite ja'uge
Ate uha hi hai jihara jivata karada hai ate marada hai. Dina ate rata da badalana vi use da adhikara vica hai tam ki tusim nahim samajhade
Sagom unham ne uha hi gala kahi jihari pahili'am ne kahi si
Unham ne kiha ki jadom asim mara javange ate asim miti ate hadi'am ho javange tam ki asim phira utha'e javange
Usa da va'ada sanu ate isa tom pahilam sade pi'um dadi'am nu vi dita gi'a. Iha sirafa purani'am kahani'am hana
Akho ki dharati vica ate jihara kujha isa de adara hai uha kisada hai, jekara tusim janade ho
Uha kahinage iha alaha da hai. Akho, ki phira tusim socade nahim
Akho, ki satam asamanam da malaka kauna hai ate mahana sighasana da malaka kauna hai
Uha kahinage ki sabha alaha da hai. Akho, phira tusim darade ki'um nahim
Akho, ki kauna hai jisa de hatha vica hara ciza da adhikara hai ate uha hi sarana dida hai. Usa de mukabale ko'i sarana nahim de sakada jekara tusim samajhade ho
Uha kahinage ki iha alaha la'i hai. Akho, ki phira kithom tuhade te jadu ho janda hai
sagom asim' unham kola saca li'a'e ham ate yakinana hi uha jhuthe hana

Alaha ne ko'i putara nahim bana'i'a ate na hi usa de barabara ko'i pujanayoga hai. Jekara ajiha huda tam hareka khuda apani khalakata nu lai ke ada ho janda ate uha ika dusare upara hamala karada. Alaha pavitara hai usa tom jihara uha bi'ana karade hana
Uha khuli'am ate gujhi'am nu janana vala hai uha usa nalom bahuta uca hai jisa nu iha usa da sarika bana'unde hana
Akho, ki he mere palanahara! Jekara tu mainu uha dikha deve jisa da inham nala va'ada kita ja riha hai
Tam he mere palanahara! Mainu zalima lokam vica samila na kara
Yakinana asim inham nala jihara va'ada kara rahe ham uha tuhanu dikha dena di takata rakhade ham
Tusim bura'i nu usa tarike nala ronkom jihara vadhi'a hove. Asim cagi tar'ham janade ham jihara iha loka akhade hana
Ate kahom ki he mere palanahara! Maim sarana magada ham, saitanam de sure vicaram tom
Ate he mere palanahara! Maim tere tom sarana magada ham ki uha mere pasa a'una
Ithom taka ki jadom unham vicom`kise nu mauta a jandi hai tam uha kahida hai ki he mere palanahara! Mainu vapisa bhejade
Tam ki jisa nu maim chada a'i'a ham usa vica kujha puna kamavam. Kade vi nahim, iha sirafa ika gala hai jihari uha kahida hai ate unham de age usa dina taka la'i parada hai jadom uha utha'e janage
Phira jadom bigala ja'i'a javega tam unham de vicakara na ko'i risata rahega ate na ko'i kise nu puchega
Phira jinham de palare bhari honage uhi loka safala honage
Ate jinham ne apane apa nu ghate vica pa'i'a unham de palare halake honage. Ate uha naraka vica hamesa rahinage
Unham de cehari'am nu aga jhulasa devegi ate uha usa nala karupa (bada sakala) ho janage
Ki tuhanu meri'am a'itam parha ke nahim suna'i'am jandi'am sana ate phira tusim usa tom inakara karade si
Uha kahinage ki he sade palanahara! Sadi mari kisamata ne sanu ghera li'a ate asim bhatake ho'e loka si
He sade palanahara! Sanu isa vicom kadha lai phira jekara asim ajiha kari'e tam binham saka asim zalima ham
Alaha akhega ki dura ho, ise vica pa'e rahom ate mere nala gala na karo
Mere badi'am vicom ika varaga si jihara kahida si ki he sade palanahara! Asim imana li'a'e ham isa la'i tu sanu mu'afa kara de ate sade upara rahimata kara, tu sabha tom vada rahimata karana vala hai
Tam tusim unham nu mazaka bana li'a ithom taka ki unham tom pichom tusim sadi yada bhula diti ate tusim unham upara hasade rahe
Maim unham nu aja unham de sabara da fala dita hai uha hi safala hona vale hana
Akhi'a javega ki var'hi'am di ginati nala tusim kini dera dharati te rahe
Uha kahinage ki asim ika dina rahe jam ika dina tom vi ghata. Phira ginati vali'am nu pucha lavo
Akhi'a javega ki tusim thorha samam hi rahe. Kasa! Tusim janade hude
Phira ki tusim iha samajhade ho ki asim tuhanu binham makasada tom paida kita hai ate tusim sade kola nahim li'ande ja'uge
Alaha vadi'a'i'am vala hai, saca patasaha hai usa tom binham ko'i pujanayoga nahim uha mahana sighasana da malaka hai

Ate jihara bada alaha de barabara kise hora pujanayoga nu bulave, jisa de pakha vica usa de pasa ko'i pramana nahim tam usa da hisaba kitaba alaha de kaula hai. Bina saka avagi'akari'am nu safalata nahim milegi
Ate akho ki he mere palanahara! Mainu mu'afa kara de ate mere upara rahimata kara. Tu sabha tom caga rahima karana vala hai
